title: Lesson 1 - A dbt model is just SQL
summary: Start with plain SQL to prove models are regular queries.
description: Before configs, refs, or manifests, a dbt model is literally a .sql file stored in your repo. dbt does not inject clauses or fix mistakes for you.
concept: dbt's job is structure. Your job is writing valid SQL.
takeaway: dbt doesn't change SQL. It changes how SQL fits together.

models.title: orders.sql
models.description: Edit freely to see how dbt treats raw SQL.
models.sql:
select
  order_id,
  customer_id,
  order_date
from raw_orders
